onset.Description: Onset time of event in seconds

duration.Description: Duration time of event in seconds

Levels.2back_nonlure: 2-back trial with a non-target, non-lure stimulus
Levels.2back_lure: 2-back trial with a lure (stimulus matches 1-back, not 2-back)
Levels.2back_target: 2-back trial with a target match (same as 2-back prior stimulus)
Levels.2back_full: Full duration of a 2-back block including for all trials within block from onset to last offset
Levels.0back_lure: 0-back trial with a lure (stimulus similar to but not the target)
Levels.0back_target: 0-back trial where stimulus matches the specified target
Levels.0back_full: Full duration of a 0-back block including for all trials within block from onset to last offset
Levels.fixation: Fixation or rest block shown between working memory blocks

block_type.Description: Label for the specific experimental block in the WM task

stimulus_type.Description: Category of the visual stimulus shown to the participant

response_time.Description: Time taken by the participant to respond, in milliseconds

accuracy.Description: Participantâ€™s response accuracy for the trial (1.0 = correct, 0.0 = incorrect) for blocks is entire block average

target_type.Description: Type of stimulus demand by stimulus

Levels.target: Correct match to task condition (e.g., 2-back or 0-back target)
Levels.nonlure: Stimulus not expected to match target or lure condition
Levels.lure: Stimulus resembles target but does not meet matching condition
